channel.title: markdown on Ock
channel.description: Recent content in markdown on Ock

item.title: Notion으로 Posting
item.description: 글 작성 --- layout: post title: 제목 subtitle: 부제목 date: 글 작성 시간 categories: 카테고리 tags: 테그 or [테그, 테그....] comments: true <- 댓글 사용 여부 --- 처음에 마크다운 문법 에러가 계속 났었는데 알고보

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
